articles.title: Liberia Records 322 Measles Cases - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: The ministry of health announces that based on data received from health workers, a total of 322 suspected measles cases have been reported in five counties here. Of the number of cases, laboratory test has identified and confirmed 72 of them.
